cpl.readme:
A plugin for a top menu and a switchable left menu. The tiddler [[Top menu|$:/plugins/tg/topleftmenu/topmenu]] need to be populated with tag based top menu entries. The tiddler [[Left menu|$:/plugins/tg/topleftmenu/leftmenu/entries]] need to be populated with menu entries (based on links, tags, tagpills, sliders, TOC macro, ...). For more information see: http://tw5topleft.tiddlyspot.com/ <<< ''Note:''
''This plugin needs my [[$:/plugins/tg/layout]] plugin for general layout settings (available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/).'' <<< Settings for the layout can be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]]''.
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tg/topleftmenu
cpl.author: TonGerner
cpl.name: Top + left menu
title: Plugin_202203244144506
